MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KY8 postcode area of Leven, affecting properties in Links Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.48pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the School Lane substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:30pm on Saturday 27th February 2021.
